::Battera::

"But what could be lost by trying? THe war is going on now.  If we at 
lest try, there is the chance for peace. Isn't worth a little risk? 
I'm risking my life for this chance. And I'm a pred wanting peace? 
Who would have thought about it, a peace loving pred.  I know it 
sounds strange, but it's true."  She sighed. "how can one bot bring 
about peace when all the other bota want war. I'll never understand 
it."  She let a tear run down her cheek. "I've lost too many 
companions to this was and I just want it to stop."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex shakes his head, still frowning. Battera seemed sincere, but 
sincerity 
> could be easily faked. As well as hysterics.
> 
> "No, only Predacons torture and kill like that," he says, his 
prejudiced 
> views getting past him, "Its really up to the Maximal commander, I 
just don't 
> think that peace between Maximals and Predacons would be 
successful."
